items.value: Gets a bonus for nearby <style=POS>Trees</style> and <style=POS>Sawmills</style>. Loses points for <style=NEG>Resorts</style> or other <style=NEG>Lumberjacks</style> in range.
Gets points from nearby <style=POS>Lumberjacks</style> and <style=POS>Warehouses</style>. Loses points for <style=NEG>Resorts</style> or other <style=NEG>Sawmills</style> in range.
Gets a bonus for nearby <style=POS>Hop Fields</style> and <style=POS>Warehouses</style>. Loses points for other <style=NEG>Breweries</style> in range.
Gets a bonus for nearby <style=POS>Sandpits</style>, <style=POS>Masons</style> and <style=POS>Warehouses</style>. Loses points for other <style=NEG>Brickyards</style> in range.
Gets a bonus for nearby <style=POS>Houses</style>. Loses points for <style=NEG>Mansions</style>, <style=NEG>Temples</style> and other <style=NEG>Brickyards</style> in range.

Gets a bonus for nearby <style=POS>Fishers</style> and <style=POS>Masons</style>. Loses points for <style=NEG>Shamans</style>, <style=NEG>Resorts</style> and other <style=NEG>City Centers</style> in range.

Gets a bonus for nearby <style=POS>Mills</style>, <style=POS>Plateaus</style>, <style=POS>Resorts</style> and other <style=POS>Wheat Fields</style>. Loses points for <style=NEG>Hop Fields</style> in range.
Gets a bonus for nearby <style=POS>City Centers</style> and <style=POS>Huts</style>. Loses points for other <style=NEG>Fishers</style> in range.

Gets a bonus for nearby <style=POS>City Centers</style>, <style=POS>Mansions</style>, <style=POS>Parks</style> and <style=POS>Houses</style>. Loses points for other <style=NEG>Fountains</style> in range.
Gets a bonus for nearby <style=POS>Gold Veins</style>, <style=POS>Jewelers</style> and <style=POS>Warehouses</style>. Loses points for <style=NEG>Resorts</style> in range.
Gets a bonus for nearby <style=POS>Breweries</style>, <style=POS>Resorts</style> and other <style=POS>Hop Fields</style>. Loses points for <style=NEG>Wheat Fields</style> in range.

Gets a bonus for nearby <style=POS>City Centers</style>, <style=POS>Shamans</style>, <style=POS>Plateaus</style>, <style=POS>Fountains</style>, <style=POS>Markets</style>, <style=POS>Taverns</style>, <style=POS>Towers</style>, <style=POS>Temples</style>, <style=POS>Parks</style>, <style=POS>Masons</style>, <style=POS>Circuses</style> and other <style=POS>Houses</style>. Loses points for <style=NEG>Jewelers</style> and <style=NEG>Resorts</style> in range.
Gets a bonus for nearby <style=POS>City Centers</style>, <style=POS>Shamans</style> and <style=POS>Fishers</style>. Loses points for <style=NEG>Industrial Buildings</style> in range.
Gets a bonus for nearby <style=POS>Goldmines</style> and <style=POS>Mansions</style>. Loses points for <style=NEG>Houses</style> and other <style=NEG>Jewelers</style> in range.

Gets a bonus for nearby <style=POS>City Centers</style>, <style=POS>Shamans</style>, <style=POS>Plateaus</style>, <style=POS>Fountains</style>, <style=POS>Markets</style>,  <style=POS>Towers</style>, <style=POS>Temples</style>, <style=POS>Parks</style>, and other <style=POS>Mansions</style>. Loses points for <style=NEG>Circuses</style> and <style=NEG>Resorts</style> in range.

Gets a bonus for nearby <style=POS>Warehouses</style>, <style=POS>City Centers</style>, <style=POS>Masons</style>, <style=POS>Fishers</style>, <style=POS>Mansions</style> and  <style=POS>Houses</style>.  Loses points for other <style=NEG>Markets</style> in range.

Gets a bonus for nearby <style=POS>Brickyards</style>, <style=POS>Warehouses</style>, <style=POS>Towers</style>, <style=POS>Markets</style>, <style=POS>City Centers</style>, <style=POS>Plateaus</style> and  <style=POS>Temples</style>.  Loses points for <style=NEG>Shamans</style> and other <style=NEG>masons</style> in range.

Gets a bonus for nearby <style=POS>Fields</style>, <style=POS>Warehouses</style> and <style=POS>Masons</style>. Loses points for <style=NEG>Resorts</style> and other <style=NEG>Mills</style> in range.
Gets a bonus for nearby <style=POS>Resorts</style>, <style=POS>City Buildings</style> and <style=POS>Fields</style>. Loses points for <style=NEG>Industrial Buildings</style> in range.
Gets a bonus for nearby <style=POS>City Centers</style>, <style=POS>Masons</style> and other  <style=POS>Plateaus</style>.

Gets a bonus for nearby <style=POS>Fields</style>, <style=POS>Parks</style>, <style=POS>Breweries</style> and <style=POS>Nature</style>. Loses points from <style=NEG>Industrial Buildings</style> and <style=NEG>City Buildings</style> in range.
Gets a bonus for nearby <style=POS>Brickyards</style>. Loses points from other <style=NEG>Sandpits</style> in range.

Gets a bonus for nearby <style=POS>Temples</style> and <style=POS>Flowers</style>. Loses points from <style=NEG>Mason</style>, <style=NEG>City Centers</style> and other <style=NEG>Shamans</style> in range.
Almost <style=POS>Every Building</style> gets a bonus for being placed near this ancient and mysterious monument.
Gets a bonus for nearby <style=POS>Breweries</style>, <style=POS>City Centers</style> and <style=POS>Houses</style>. Loses points from other <style=NEG>Taverns</style> in range.

Gets a bonus for nearby <style=POS>Masons</style>, <style=POS>Shamans</style> and <style=POS>Residential Buildings</style>. Loses points from <style=NEG>Markets</style>, <style=NEG>Mills</style>, <style=NEG>Taverns</style>, <style=NEG>Circuses</style>, <style=NEG>Goldmines</style>, <style=NEG>Brickyards</style> and <style=NEG>Sawmills</style> in range.
Gets a bonus for nearby <style=POS>Masons</style> and <style=POS>City Buildings</style>. Loses points from other <style=NEG>Towers</style> in range.

Gets a bonus for nearby <style=POS>City Buildings</style>, <style=POS>Temples</style>, <style=POS>Markets</style>, <style=POS>Masons</style> and <style=POS>Jewelers</style>. Loses points from other <style=NEG>Walls</style> in range.
Gets a bonus for nearby <style=POS>City Centers</style> and other <style=POS>Wall Platforms</style>.
Gets a bonus for nearby <style=POS>Industrial Buildings</style>. Loses points for <style=NEG>Resorts</style> and other <style=NEG>Warehouses</style>.
Gets a bonus for nearby <style=POS>Sawmills</style>, <style=POS>Trees</style> and other <style=POS>Water Platforms</style>.
